Pamela Jooste (amuru Cape Town ) bu onye ode akwukwo South Afrika
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, soro ada ogbenye gwu egwu, meriri afo 1998 Commonwealth Writers' Prize, akwụkwọ mbụ kacha mma, Africa, na ihe nrite Sanlam maka akụkọ ifo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ndị mbipụta Howard Timmins, yana BP Southern Afrika
Ọ lụrụ di ma biri na Cape Town.
